plugin.name: Overgrowth
plugin.author: Aerys
plugin.purpose: Basic set of visual cues meant to help track the flow of battle
plugin.description:
This is a set of basic visual cues and commands meant to primarily aid in tracking of one's enemy and the alert of others' instakills.
Initial release 1.0 includes: Basic directional movement of targets, including mounts and Demigod ChoiceEnter and ChoiceExit messages. Basic Announcements of instakills, 1st person and 3rd person. Automated shielding on call. Automated following on call.
Release 1.1: Addition of rudimentary rebounding echoes. Thanks Rivius! Basic echoes for elevation changes based on treetops.
Release 1.2 Added alerts for summon, provided you have Aethersight. WEB alias, for pointing a web enchantment at whatever has been set to a quicktarget. - Good for stopping most instakillers wihtout changing targets.
Release 1.3 Countless tiny mistakes surrounding QT and WEB.
Release 1.4 Fixed target enter trigger. Fixed treetops - climb down trigger. Implementing SVN hosting, changelog will continue there.

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ raises [Hh](?:is|er) arms and hums deeply the note of the forest\, which breaks into a discordant tone\.
trigger.name: Overgrowth_wyrded1

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ presses [Hh](?:is|er) lips together and makes a buzzing sound\. S?[Hh]e then opens [Hh](?:is|er) mouth and vomits forth a stream of swarming locusts that greedily infest the surrounding land and gorge themselves until they bloat\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_wyrded2

trigger.match: Slowly raising [Hh](?:is|er) arms above [Hh](?:is|er) head\, [A-Z][a-z]+ shouts a guttural phrase that causes the ground to rumble\. Tendrils of black smoke rise up from the earth and choke the life out of the surrounding foliage\, which shrivels up and becomes brittle\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_taintforest
trigger.send: ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|")

trigger.match: ^Thick\, oily smoke pours out of the mouth of [A-Z][a-z]+ and creates an ankle\-deep carpet of seething black fog\. As the smoke is soaked into the ground\, the area turns putrid and foul\. This location is now tainted\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_taint
trigger.send: ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkred","","|-----------------------TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED TAINTED-----------------------|")

trigger.match: ^(?:You|[A-Z][a-z]+) raises? (?:[Hh](?:is|er)|your) arms and hums? deeply the note of the forest\.
trigger.name: Overgrowth_forested

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ takes a deep breath\, then slowly breathes out\, as the temperature in the room falls and banks of clouds roll in
trigger.name: Overgrowth_clouds

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ spins slowly around in a circle(?: and water bubbles up from the ground\, flooding the area\.|\, causing water to bubble and froth\, becoming pure and clean\.)$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_flood
trigger.send: ColourNote("darkblue","","|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkblue","","|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|") ColourNote("darkblue","","|-----------------------FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED FLOODED-----------------------|")

trigger.match: ^After rubbing [Hh](?:is|er) hands together\, [A-Z][a-z]+ pulls them apart and releases thousands of glowing red sparks that whirl around [Hh](?:im|er) in a chaotic dance before flaring into small flames that spread out across the expanse of the location
trigger.name: Overgrowth_flames

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ sweeps the air with [Hh](?:is|er) hand and [Hh](?:is|er) eyes glow with a phosphorescent blue\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_aeromeld
trigger.send: ColourNote("dodgerblue","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") ColourNote("dodgerblue","","|------------------AEROMANCER AEROMANCER AEROMANCER AEROMANCER----------------|") ColourNote("dodgerblue","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ stomps on the ground and [Hh](?:is|er) eyes shine with an eerie red glow\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_geomeld

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ kneels down and touches [Hh](?:is|er) forehead to the earth\, then whispers softly\. A deep emerald glow ripples across the ground and [A-Z][a-z]+\'s eyes momentarily flash with a matching emerald light\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_hartmeld

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ claps [Hh](?:is|er) hands and [Hh](?:is|er) head is momentarily wreathed with a crown of flames\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_pyromeld
trigger.send: ColourNote("darkorange","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") ColourNote("darkorange","","|------------------PYROMANCER PYROMANCER PYROMANCER PYROMANCER----------------|") ColourNote("darkorange","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ crouches low and looses a terrifying\, raucous cry that echoes through the air\, the shadows writhing and whispering with a seething\, malevolent will\. A horrific mauve light twists across the ground\, the plant\-life shuddering violently in response\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_crowmeld
trigger.send: ColourNote("mediumorchid","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|") ColourNote("mediumorchid","","|------------------BLACKTALON BLACKTALON BLACKTALON BLACKTALON----------------|") ColourNote("mediumorchid","","|------------------------------MELD MELD MELD MELD----------------------------|")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) bends down and traces trails in the water with [hH](?:is|er) finger\. The waters sparkle with flecks of azure light\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_aquameld

trigger.match: ^You see the following people here\:\n^(|.*? )(\w+)$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_name
trigger.send: SetVariable("name","%2")

trigger.match: ^Password correct\. Welcome to Lusternia\.$
trigger.send: if GetVariable("name") == "0" then Send("who here") end

trigger.match: ^You muster ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s Squad\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_muster
trigger.send: DoAfterSpecial(1, 'SendNoEcho("say Squad formed")', sendto.script) SetVariable("squad", "1") SetVariable("squad_leader", "%1")

trigger.match: ^You are not the leader of a squad\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_noleader
trigger.send: SendNoEcho("say I'm not squad leader") if GetVariable("squad") == "0" then SendNoEcho("squad muster") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) drafts you into .+?\, and you step into formation behind your new commandant\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_drafted
trigger.send: SetVariable("squad", "1") SetVariable("squad_leader", "%1")

trigger.match: ^(?:You|[A-Z][a-z]+) disbands? .+?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_disband
trigger.send: SetVariable("squad", "0")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) tells you\, \"Squad\s?(me|\w+)?\.\"$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_draft
trigger.send: if "%2" == "me" or "%2" == "" then SetVariable("last_recruit", "%1") else SetVariable("last_recruit", "%2") end Execute("draft "..GetVariable("last_recruit"))

trigger.match: ^That person is not willing to join a squad led by you\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_nolove
trigger.send: Send("say to "..GetVariable("last_recruit").." You need to ally me first.")

trigger.match: ^That person is already a member of a squad\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_alreadyhas
trigger.send: Send("say to "..GetVariable("last_recruit").." You already have a squad.")

trigger.match: ^You have been slain by .+?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squad_lost
trigger.send: SetVariable("squad", "0")

trigger.match: ^You stumble as you feel invisible strands of force wrap around you\, followed by a high\-pitched thrum\.$\n^(.*?)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_summon1
trigger.send: if string.find("%1","You sense") then local name = string.gsub("%1", "You sense ", "") name = string.gsub(name, " pulling on the strands of aether surrounding you", "") overgrow(name.." SUMMONING YOU","red") else overgrow("SUMMONING","white") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) suddenly stumbles as the air is filled with a high-pitched thrum\.$\n^(.*?)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_summon2
trigger.send: local summoned = "%1" if string.find("%2","You sense") then local name = string.gsub("%2", "You sense ", "") name = string.gsub(name, " pulling on the strands of aether surrounding "..summoned, "") overgrow(string.upper(name).." SUMMONING "..string.upper(summoned),"red") segtell(name.." is summoning "..summoned) else overgrow(summoned.." BEING SUMMONED","white") end

trigger.match: ([A-Z][a-z]+) rubs .*? and it begins to glow with a pulsating light\.$\n^Warm water showers down upon [Hh](?:im|er)\, and [Ss]?[Hh]e scrubs under [Hh](?:is|er) armpits trying to wash away that sticky sap.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_cleanse_enchant
trigger.send: segtell("%1 has CLEANSED sap!")

trigger.match: ^Warm water showers down upon ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, who scrubs under [Hh](?:is|er) armpits trying to wash away that sticky sap\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_cleanse_enchant_other
trigger.send: segtell("%1 has CLEANSED sap!!")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to vigorously scrub [Hh](?:im|er)self all over\, trying to remove the sticky sap coating [Hh](?:is|er) body\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_cleanse_soap
trigger.send: segtell("%1 has CLEANSED sap!!")

trigger.match: ^\(Serenwilde Elite Guard\)\: ([A-Z][a-z]+) says\, \"Target(?:ing)?\:? (\w+)\.\"$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_targeted
trigger.send: SetVariable("targetcalled",string.lower("%2")) if targcheck(GetVariable("targetcalled")) then return else if GetVariable("autotarg") == "1" then if targcheck("%2") then return else Execute("ogt %2") end else SetVariable("quicktarg","%2") ognote("Quicktarget set to %2") end end

trigger.match: ^You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_rebounding1
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then ColourNote("magenta", "", "You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around %1.") ognote("Rebounding up!") else ColourNote("silver", "", "You suddenly perceive the vague outline of an aura of rebounding around %1.") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s aura of weapons rebounding disappears\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_rebounding2
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then ColourNote("blue", "", "%1's aura of weapons rebounding disappears.") ognote("Rebounding down!!") else ColourNote("silver", "", "%1's aura of weapons rebounding disappears.") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) crouches low to the ground and stares at the sky\, suddenly leaping up above as [Ss]?[Hh]e grabs ([A-Z][a-z]+) flying overhead\, flinging [Hh](?:im|er) towards the ground\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_highjump1
trigger.send: OGcaution("%2","HIGHJUMPED")

trigger.match: ^Discerning ([A-Z][a-z]+) flying high above\, you lie in wait until [Ss]?[Hh]e is directly overhead before jumping high into the air and grabbing firmly onto [Hh](?:is|er) torso\. A look of surprise crosses [Hh](?:is|er) features as you fling [Hh](?:im|er) forcefully at the ground\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_highjump2
trigger.send: OGcaution("%1","HIGHJUMPED") segtell(string.upper("%1").." was HIGHJUMPED.")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) comes arcing into the room and lands with a loud thump\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_springtrap_in__
trigger.send: overgrow("%1 flung in! QT to target!!","cyan") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gazes longingly at (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_pfifth__
trigger.send: OGcaution("%1","PFIFTHED!!! BLANKNOTE or HINDER")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z[a-z]+)\'s mana stands at (\d+)/(\d+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_contemplate
trigger.send: if tonumber("%3")%tonumber(5) == 0 then if %2/%3 <= .25 then segtell("%1\'s mana is below 25%. TOADCURSE NOW!") elseif %2/%3 <= .5 and %2/%3 > .25 then segtell("%1\'s mana is at " .. round(((%2/%3) * 100)) .. "\%\. TOADCURSE POSSIBLE\.") end end

trigger.match: ^Shadows suddenly leap out from every corner\, violently whirling about in a sudden surge from ([A-Z][a-z]+) to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, then slightly dissipate\.
trigger.name: Overgrowth_choke
trigger.send: OGwarning("%1"," CHOKED!!!") segtell(string.upper("%1").." CHOKED.") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1")

trigger.match: ^The foul wind picks you up and hurls you to the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_squall__
trigger.send: if "%1" == "west" then dir = "east" elseif "%1" == "northwest" then dir = "southeast" elseif "%1" == "north" then dir = "south" elseif "%1" == "northeast" then dir = "southwest" elseif "%1" == "east" then dir = "west" elseif "%1" == "southeast" then dir = "northwest" elseif "%1" == "south" then dir = "north" elseif "%1" == "southwest" then dir = "northeast" elseif "%1" == "in" then dir = "out" elseif "%1" == "out" then dir = "in" elseif "%1" == "up" then dir = "down" elseif "%1" == "down" then dir = "up" else dir = "back" end overgrow("SQUALLED!!! GO "..string.upper(dir).."! GO "..string.upper(dir).."! GO "..string.upper(dir).."!", "yellow")

trigger.match: ^Deciding to teach ([A-Z][a-z]+) the ultimate lesson in manners\, you point a finger imperiously at [Hh](?:im|er) and call the curse of the toad down upon [Hh](?:is|er) head\. You watch in satisfaction as warts break out over [Hh](?:is|er) skin which then turns green and slimy\. Finally, [Ss]?[Hh]e shrinks and transforms into a large\, ugly toad\!$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_toad1__
trigger.send: SetVariable("toad","%1") overgrow(string.upper("%1").." TOADED") overgrow(string.upper("%1").." TOADED") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has been TOADED! STOMP TOAD!!")

trigger.match: ^Eyes flashing with anger\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) points a finger imperiously at ([A-Z][a-z]+) and utters a series of guttural croaks\. You watch in amazement as warts break out over [A-Z][a-z]+\'s skin which then turns green and slimy\. Finally\, [Ss]?[Hh]e shrinks and transforms into a large\, ugly toad\!$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_toad2__
trigger.send: SetVariable("toad","%2") overgrow(string.upper("%2").." TOADED") overgrow(string.upper("%2").." TOADED")

trigger.match: ^Eyes flashing with anger\, [A-Z][a-z]+ points a finger imperiously at you and utters a series of guttural croaks\. A strange thrumming fills your stomach\, and you watch in horror as warts break out over your skin which then turns green and slimy\. The world seems to suddenly become much larger\.\.\.or are you becoming smaller\? Hmm\, why do you have a sudden craving for flies\?$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_toad3
trigger.send: ColourNote("purple","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("purple","black","") ColourNote("purple","black","TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") ColourNote("purple","black","TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") ColourNote("purple","black","TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") ColourNote("purple","black","TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED TOADED") ColourNote("purple","black","") ColourNote("purple","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) raises .*? over [Hh](?:is|er) head and begins to swing it in a wide circle\, gaining speed as [Ss]?[Hh]e goes\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_decap1
trigger.send: OGcaution("%1","started DECAPITATE") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has begun a DECAPITATE") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to bear down on ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, whirling .*?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_decap2
trigger.send: OGwarning("%1","DECAPITATING %2! VINE WEB or GUST!!") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has DECAPITATE on "..string.upper("%2").."!") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) begins to bear down on you\, whirling .*?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_decap3
trigger.send: ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") ColourNote("red","black","DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") ColourNote("red","black","DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") ColourNote("red","black","DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP DECAP") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) flings a tarot card at (\w+) and upon impact\, it disappears\. An ominous silence overtakes your surroundings\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_soulless
trigger.send: if "%2" == "you" then ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") Note("") ColourNote("red","black","SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") ColourNote("red","black","SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") ColourNote("red","black","SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") ColourNote("red","black","SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS SOULLESS") Note("") ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") else OGwarning("%1","SOULLESS.") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has SOULLESS on %2.") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) points at the tainted earth beneath your feet\, snarling with a look of madness on [Hh](?:is|er) face\. The ground begins to tremble\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_chasm1
trigger.send: ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("yellow","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("yellow","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("yellow","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s finger trembles and [Ss]?[Hh]e bares [Hh](?:is|er) teeth in a hideous grimace\. A small crack appears in the ground beneath you\!$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_chasm2
trigger.send: ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("red","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("red","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("red","black","CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM CHASM") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) calls down a beam of brilliant light upon (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_judge1
trigger.send: if "%2" == "you" then ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("yellow","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("yellow","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("yellow","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") else OGwarning("%1","JUDGING.") segtell(string.upper("%1").." is JUDGING %2.") SetVariable("quicktarg","%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) chants and a column of topaz light appears before [Hh](?:im|er)\. S?[Hh]e points at you and the column of light obediently moves to envelop you\, a voice whispering in your mind that you will be judged\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_judge2
trigger.send: ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("red","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("red","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("red","black"," JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE JUDGE") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has JUDGEMENT on me! VINE or GUST!")

trigger.match: ^\".+?\" sings ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, (?:somber notes tumbling out of .+?|as .+? plays deep\, dark melodies|tragically playing .+? with a mournful thrum|while .+? lets loose with screaming melodies)\, and [Ss]?[Hh]e looks directly at (.*?)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_deathsong1
trigger.send: if "%2" == "you" then ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("yellow","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("yellow","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("yellow","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("yellow","black","") ColourNote("yellow","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") else segtell(string.upper("%1").." has begun DEATHSONG.") SetVariable("quicktarg", "%1") ognote("Quicktarget set to %1") end

trigger.match: ^\w+ turns his attention towards \w+.$
trigger.name: dramaturgy
trigger.send: EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_deathsong1", false) EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_deathsong2", false) EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_decap1", false) EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_decap2", false) DoAfterSpecial(.5, [[EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_deathsong1", true)]], sendto.script) DoAfterSpecial(.5, [[EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_deathsong2", true)]], sendto.script) DoAfterSpecial(.5, [[EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_decap1", true)]], sendto.script) DoAfterSpecial(.5, [[EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_decap2", true)]], sendto.script)

trigger.match: ^Clasping [Hh](?:is|er) hands to [Hh](?:is|er) breast\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) sings to you\, wishing you well on your journey to the Halls of the Fates\. A white light surrounds [Hh](?:im|er) as the voices of an angelic choir join [Hh](?:is|er) in this somber hymn\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_deathsong2
trigger.send: ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("red","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("red","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("red","black","DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG DEATHSONG") ColourNote("red","black","") ColourNote("red","black","+-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=[OVERGROWTH]=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-+") segtell(string.upper("%1").." has DEATHSONG on me! GUST them now!")

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? leaves to the (\w+)(?:, emanating an aura of immense power)?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_enemytrack1
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? (?:enters|arrives) from the (\w+)(?:, emanating an aura of immense power)?\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_enemytrack2
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target returned: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ locks [Hh](?:is|er) arms around ([A-Z][a-z]+) and the two vanish up and out of sight\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_seize1
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: Seized. CLIMB UP! CLIMB UP!") end

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ swings down below the canopy and re\-emerges with [Hh](?:is|er) arms clasped around ([A-Z][a-z]+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_seize2
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target returned: Seized") end

trigger.match: ^Your arms lock themselves about ([A-Z][a-z]+) and you hoist [Hh](?:im|er)\, legs kicking wildly\, up into the treetops\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_seize3
trigger.send: overgrow("%1 SEIZED!!")

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ gives a vicious shove to ([A-Z][a-z]+)\, who falls backwards through the tree branches\.$

trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: Shoved. CLIMB DOWN! CLIMB DOWN!") end

trigger.match: ^You give ([A-Z][a-z]+) a vicious shove and watch in satisfaction as [Ss]?[Hh]e suffers a horrible fall\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_shove2
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: Shoved. CLIMB DOWN! CLIMB DOWN!") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gently floats to the ground\.$

trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: Trees. CLIMB UP! CLIMB UP!") end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) clambers down from a nearby vantage point in the treetops\.$

trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target returned: Climbed down") end

trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target caught by Treelife!") end

trigger.name: Overgrowth_demipower_gone26__
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^Barely audible whispers permeate the air as ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? enters from the (\w+)\, a cloud of translucent figures trailing after\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_demipower_returned26__
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target returned: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^Warmth returns to your extremities as ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? glides out to the (\w+)\, a chill wind leaving frost in [Hh](?:is|er) wake\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_demipower_gone27__
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^A deathly cold wind sweeps through\, causing your very breath to begin to freeze as ([A-Z][a-z]+)(?:\, riding .+?\,)? enters from the (\w+)\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_demipower_returned27__
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target returned: "..string.upper("%2")) end

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) has left the area\.$
trigger.name: Overgrowth_gone_area
trigger.send: if targcheck("%1") then overgrow("Target gone: Left Area") end

trigger.name: Overgrowth_domoth_time
trigger.send: ColourNote("seagreen",""," Demigod: " .. 60-truncate(%1 / 60, 2) .. " minutes left.") ColourNote("seagreen",""," Ascendant: " .. 40-truncate((2/3) * %1 / 60, 2) .. " minutes left.") ColourNote("seagreen",""," Associated Ascendant: " .. 30-truncate(0.5 * %1 / 60, 2) .. " minutes left.")

alias.name: Overgrowth_autotarget
alias.send: if "%1" == "on" then SetVariable("autotarg","1") ognote("Autotargeting ON") else SetVariable("autotarg","0") ognote("Autotargeting OFF") end

alias.name: Overgrowth_help
alias.send: Note() ColourNote("seagreen","black","+-=-=-=OVERGROWTH HELP=-=-=-+") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","overgrowth filepath [C:/]<file path>") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Set the file path that your plugin xml is located at. C:/ is not required, and the path should end with the folder containing your plugin.") ColourNote("seagreen","black","(e.g. /Program Files/MUSHclient/worlds/plugins) ","lime","black","The installer xml supplement is required for this to work!!") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","overgrowth install") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Using the file path set as stated above, execute a reload of Overgrowth.","lime","black"," The installer xml supplement is required for this to work!!") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","overgrowth target <command>") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Set Overgrowth's target syntax based on your own target alias. Default is t. AG users should use x.") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","overgrowth autotarget [on|off]") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Turns autotargeting based on SEG calls on or off.") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","qt") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Quickly target the last quicktarg set or, if autotarget is off, the last target called.") Note() ColourNote("lime","black","web") ColourNote("seagreen","black","Without chaging one's active target, point a web enchantment at the last set 'quicktarget.' Good for stopping most instakills.")

muclient.script:
require "tprint"
if not GetVariable("quicktarg") then SetVariable("quicktarg","nobody") end
if not GetVariable("tarsyntax") then SetVariable("tarsyntax","t") end
if not GetVariable("autotarg") then SetVariable("autotarg","0") end
if not GetVariable("targetcalled") then SetVariable("targetcalled","nobody") end
if not GetVariable("name") then SetVariable("name", "0") end
if not GetVariable("squad") then SetVariable("squad", "0") end
function ognote(msg) Note() ColourNote("green","","< ", "white","",msg,"green",""," >") end -- function
function overgrow(msg,color) local len = string.len(msg) local color2 = color or "lime" local color = color or "seagreen"
Note("") ColourNote(color,"black","<>---"..string.rep("-",len).."---<>") ColourNote(color,"black","| ",color2,"",msg,color,""," |") ColourNote(color,"black","| ",color2,"",msg,color,""," |") ColourNote(color,"black","| ",color2,"",msg,color,""," |") ColourNote(color,"black","<>---"..string.rep("-",len).."---<>") end
function OGcaution(name,msg) local namelen = string.len(name) local msglen = string.len(msg)
Note("") ColourNote("yellow","black","<>---"..string.rep("-",namelen).."-"..string.rep("-",msglen).."---<>") ColourNote("yellow","black","| ","red","black",string.upper(name),"yellow","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("yellow","black","| ","red","black",string.upper(name),"yellow","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("yellow","black","| ","red","black",string.upper(name),"yellow","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("yellow","black","<>---"..string.rep("-",namelen).."-"..string.rep("-",msglen).."---<>") end
function OGwarning(name,msg) local namelen = string.len(name) local msglen = string.len(msg)
Note("") ColourNote("red","black","<>---"..string.rep("-",namelen).."-"..string.rep("-",msglen).."---<>") ColourNote("red","black","| ","yellow","black",string.upper(name),"red","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("red","black","| ","yellow","black",string.upper(name),"red","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("red","black","| ","yellow","black",string.upper(name),"red","black"," "..msg.." |") ColourNote("red","black","<>---"..string.rep("-",namelen).."-"..string.rep("-",msglen).."---<>") end
function segtell(msg) if GetPluginVariable("", "paused") == "1" then
else Send("clan seg tell "..msg) -- Send("clan ihc tell "..msg) end end
function round(num, idp) local mult = 10^(idp or 0) return math.floor(num * mult + 0.5) / mult end
function truncate(number, place) return math.floor(number * 10^place) / (10^place) end
last_recruit = ""
function targcheck(person) person = string.lower(person) local target = string.lower(GetPluginVariable("","target")) return string.find(person, target) == 1 end --[[ function TogglePerceive() if auto_perceive == 1 then EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_auto_perceive", false) auto_perceive = 0 elseif auto_perceive == 0 then EnableTrigger("Overgrowth_auto_percieve", true) auto_perceive = 1 end infoPanelRender() end
function infoPanelClose() --Note("Info Panel Closed") WindowShow("infoPanel", false) WindowShow("infoButton",true) end
function infoPanelOpen() --Note("Info Panel Opened") WindowShow("infoButton",false) WindowShow("infoPanel", true) end
function infoButtonRender() WindowCreate("infoButton", 0, 0, 20, 20, 8, 0, 0) WindowFont("infoButton", "buttonfont", "Courier New", 12, false, false, false, false, 1, 0) WindowRectOp("infoButton", 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, ColourNameToRGB("white")) WindowText("infoButton", "buttonfont", "*", 5, 3, 20, 20, ColourNameToRGB("white")) WindowAddHotspot("infoButton","openInfoPanel",1,1,19,19,"","","infoPanelOpen","","","",1,0) end infoButtonRender()
function infoPanelNextLine(text) WindowText("infoPanel","infofont",text, 40, (line * (GetOption("output_font_height")+2)) + (line * 4), 0, 0, ColourNameToRGB("white")) line = line + 1 end
function infoPanelRender() line = 1 WindowCreate("infoPanel", 0, 0, 400, 100, 8, 0, 0) WindowFont("infoPanel", "standard", "Courier New", 12, false, false, false, false, 1, 0) WindowFont("infoPanel", "infofont", GetInfo(20), GetOption("output_font_height") + 2, false, false, false, false, 1, 0) WindowRectOp("infoPanel", 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, ColourNameToRGB("white")) WindowRectOp("infoPanel", 1, 380, 80, 400, 100, ColourNameToRGB("white")) WindowAddHotspot("infoPanel","close",400 - (WindowTextWidth("infoPanel","standard","*") * 2) + 1,100 - GetOption("output_font_height") * 2, 400, 200,"", "", "infoPanelClose", "", "", "", 1, 0) WindowText("infoPanel", "standard", "*", 400 - WindowTextWidth("infoPanel", "standard", "*") * 2 + 5, 100 - GetOption("output_font_height") * 2 + 1, 400, 200, ColourNameToRGB("white"),false) infoPanelNextLine("Target: ") infoPanelNextLine("Quick Target (QT): ") --WindowRectOp("infoPanel", 1, 40, (4 * (GetOption("output_font_height") + 2)) + (4 * 4), 40 + WindowTextWidth("infoPanel","infofont","Melder:"), (5 * (GetOption("output_font_height") + 2)) + 20, ColourNameToRGB("white")) WindowAddHotspot("infoPanel","perceiveToggle", 40, (4 * (GetOption("output_font_height") + 2)) + (4 * 4), 40 + WindowTextWidth("infoPanel","infofont","Melder:"), (5 * (GetOption("output_font_height") + 2)) + 20, "", "", "TogglePerceive", "", "", "", 1, 0) infoPanelNextLine("Meld Type: ") infoPanelNextLine("Melder: ") WindowText("infoPanel", "infofont", GetPluginVariable("","target"),40 + WindowTextWidth("infoPanel","infofont","Target: "), GetOption("output_font_height") + 6, 0, 0, ColourNameToRGB("red")) WindowText("infoPanel", "infofont", GetVariable("quicktarg"), 40 + WindowTextWidth("infoPanel","infofont","Quick Target (QT): "), (2 * (GetOption("output_font_height") + 2)) + 8, 0, 0, ColourNameToRGB("orange")) end infoPanelRender() WindowShow("infoPanel",true)
]]--
